caption:
🗣️ Dorival Junior (SEP 2024): “Brazil will be in the 2026 World Cup final. We will be FINALISTS!” 😤🇧🇷

“You can FILM Me while I’m saying this. I have NO DOUBTS. We will be THERE!”

The very next day, Brazil lost 1-0 to Paraguay in the 2026 World Cup Qualifiers... 😭

And now, Brazil have SACKED Dorival Junior as their manager. 🇧🇷❌

Under him, Brazil won just 7 of their 16 games, and they are currently 4th in the South American WC qualifiers standings. 😳
